title: Apache Struts security advisory (AV25-800)
description: On November 11, 2025, Apache published a security advisory to address a vulnerability in the following products:
products: Apache Struts  versions Struts 2.0.0 to Struts 2.3.37 (EOL)
Apache Struts  versions Struts 2.5.0 to Struts 2.5.33 (EOL)
Apache Struts  versions Struts 6.0.0 to Struts 6.7.0
Apache Struts  versions Struts 7.0.0 to Struts 7.0.3
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
